actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill H.R. 5010 to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 5010 to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of Title 28, United States Code.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill H.R. 5010 to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims pursuant to sections 1492 and 2509 of title 28, United States Code.
